title: Law school earns national recognition (Southern Illinois University System)
text: ( Source : Southern Illinois University System ) October 15 , 2015 by Pete Rosenbery CARBONDALE, Ill. - The SIU School of Law is earning national recognition as one of National Jurist magazine's ' Best Value Law Schools for 2015.' The law school
